1.0.name: wordpress/widgetized-categories
1.0.description:
After user installs and activates the plugin the new widget will appear in the widget page of your WordPress website back-end.

User can drag the widget in any of the sidebars and create as much instances of it as he/she wants.

Additional options that are available are: 1) Categories to exclude - insert id's of the categories you want to exclude from the front end sidebar separated by comma 2) Single category to display - if you want to display only one category with it's subcategories just enter it's id in this input field 3) Display post count - if you choose yes the post count will show up next to the category name or if you choose no the post count won't be displayed
